constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of side and rear dormers extensions and 4 no. rooflights to front and side elevations
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Planning Condition 8 (Hard and Soft Landscaping) of planning permission 18/12924/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
Please note that the proposed submitted plans are not to scale. Please either add metric measurements to the plans or a scale bar to check the accuracy
